alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 4:59PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 545 PM MST... At 459 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Top-Of-The-World, or 10 miles north of Superior, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Top Of The World, Queen Valley, Top-Of-The-World and Florence Junction. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 213 and 220, and between mile markers 233 and 239. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MST for south central and southeastern Arizona.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Superior; Tonto Basin
